text: The White Caps is a 1905 American silent drama movie directed by Edwin S. Porter and Wallace McCutcheon Sr.The White CapsTHE WHITE CAPS and stars Kate Toncray, Lionel Barrymore, and John R. Cumpson. ==Actors== * Kate Toncray as The wife * Lionel Barrymore * John R. Cumpson * Arthur V. Johnson ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1905 movies Category:1900s drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Wallace McCutcheon Sr.
title: The White Caps
